title: FireFox 130.0.1
content:
I had FF130.0.1 but after reinstalling windows 10 pro, FF130.0.1 looks Totally changed, nothing is the same... HotMail is also displayed in a completely new way and which is NOT good... How do I go back? 

  Stefan
creator: Sunspider

title: Firefox is displaying menus IN CONTENT (not the Firefox hamburger) as hamburgers when they are supposed to be full text menus.  Microsoft Edge and Google Chrome display these menus IN THE CONTENT correctly. Firefox is turning them into burgers.
content:
Firefox is displaying menus IN CONTENT (not the Firefox hamburger) as hamburgers when they are supposed to be full text menus. Microsoft Edge and Google Chrome display these menus IN THE CONTENT correctly. Firefox is turning them into burgers.

This is happening with a website I own. It started when I changed ONE side menu on ONE web page to a hamberger. Firefox then began displaying ALL menus on ALL pages as drop-down burgers. The other two browsers did not engage in this stupidity.

These three images are the same page at the same time.
creator: bill86

title: Find the tab listed in about:performance
content:
I have a number of tabs that consume a lot of memory and I need to find them. I have around 800 tabs open spread over 10-12 windows, so I just cannot find tabs manually.

about:performance can list tabs that consume a lot of memory easily, but there seems to be no way to actually switch to the tab.

Did I miss something? Is there a way to focus tabs located in about:performance?
creator: Galmok

title: Bookmarks library absent from desktop
content:
I was using a Windows & machine and the version of Firefox I had included my bookmarks library in an accessible column on the left side. I recently got a new computer & a professional set it up for me. It appears he installed a more recent version of Firefox--and I can find no way to attach my library in the same, easily accessible fashion. Instead, I have to go through a number of steps to access the library.

I'm hoping there is a way to do this. Otherwise, this version is in no way as useful as the old one I had with W7.

Thanks!
creator: jcarnahan79

title: Tab grouping?? Lock tab when? Firefox was best now it's lost to Microsoft edge with features. Cmon FIREFOX!

creator: rennafoxy

title: I do NOT suscribe to Mozilla VPN nor install it, but the program keeps overriding my ExpressVPN, which causes constant disconnects. what do I do?
content: I need to know why Mozilla is hijacking my VPN. I only have BitdefenderVPN, which I no longer use, and ExpressVPN, which is what I now use. Today when I connect through Firefox, MozillaVPN keeps shutting down my ExpressVPN and opening itself. I have a tug-of-war between the two, even though I did not subscribe to nor install MozillaVPN. I believe this happened after the latest Firefox update. Any ideas? I run Windows 11 64-bit, which seems not to play well with LOTS of programs, include some browser extensions.
creator: gcoregistrar
